
This directory contains the source and internal include files for
the XTOS library. The files are organized as follows:

  xtos
   ├── examples
   │   ├── multicore
   │   │   └── sample_lsp
   │   └── reset_user_init
   ├── not_certified
   ├── xea2
   └── xea3

  xtos (this directory)
    Common XTOS files.

  xea2
    Files required for cores based on the XEA2 exception architecture.

  xea3
    Files required for cores based on the XEA3 exception architecture.

  not_certified
    Files that contain production code but have not been certified for
    Functional Safety (FuSa) use.

  examples
    XTOS examples.

---
